conbody.p: The following examples illustrate the application of the evaluation procedures in 25.502 and 25.503 . The examples assume that the contracting officer has eliminated all offers that are unacceptable for reasons other than price or a trade agreement (see 25.502(a)(1)). The evaluation factor may change as provided in agency regulations.
